tool_description: Get live cricket score for international and domestic matches. Also get detailed scorecard for batsmen and bowlers.
name: Live Cricket Score
title: Live Cricket Score

api_list.name: Match Details
api_list.description: Full match live scorecard for batsmen and bowlers along with both teams scorecards for all innings.

api_list.name: Get Latest Matches
api_list.description: This end point gives latest information for all matches (live or scheduled) with `matchID` and `seriesID`.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-cricket-score2.p.rapidapi.com/latest-matches"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-cricket-score2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://live-cricket-score2.p.rapidapi.com/latest-matches"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-cricket-score2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
